text: Key Facts State: Carinthia District city: Völkermarkt Area: 907.49 km² Population: 43,575 (15 May 2001) Population density: 48 people per km² Registration plate code: `VK` map Völkermarkt District is an administrative district in Carinthia, Austria. The administrative center is also named Völkermarkt. ==Municipalities== Völkermarkt is divided into 13 municipalities, of which 2 are towns and 3 market towns. ===Towns=== *Bleiburg (Slov.: Pliberk) (4,083) **Aich, Bleiburg, Dobrowa, Draurain, Ebersdorf, Einersdorf, Grablach, Kömmel, Kömmelgupf, Loibach, Lokowitzen, Moos, Replach, Rinkenberg, Rinkolach, Ruttach, Schattenberg, Schilterndorf, St. Georgen, St. Margarethen, Weißenstein, Wiederndorf, Woroujach *Völkermarkt (Slov.: Velikovec) (11,373) **Admont, Aich, Arlsdorf, Attendorf, Bach, Berg ob Attendorf, Berg ob St. Martin, Bergstein,
